body:
Comment 9 by **nfa106**: 
Update: Today I re-updated the branch to test again. Compilation/test 
still fails but the hello world program works now.

nfa@b3:~/go/src$ echo $GOARM
5
nfa@b3:~/go/src$ hg pull
warning: go.googlecode.com certificate with fingerprint 
03:60:ab:1f:ea:ca:9b:97:e2:20:0b:fc:6c:4d:27:2d:6f:38:76:06 not verified 
(check hostfingerprints or web.cacerts config setting)
pulling from https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
searching for changes
adding changesets
adding manifests
adding file changes
added 42 changesets with 148 changes to 129 files
(run 'hg update' to get a working copy)
nfa@b3:~/go/src$ hg update release
40 files updated, 0 files merged, 0 files removed, 0 files unresolved
nfa@b3:~/go/src$ ./all.bash
deps.bash: Make.deps is read-only; aborting.
nfa@b3:~/go/src$ sudo ./all.bash
.
.
.

---- A LOT OF COMPILE MESSAGES SNIPPED ---
.
.
.

test archive/tar
